text: Bygdebladet (The Country Gazette) is a newspaper published in Sjøholt in Møre og Romsdal county, Norway.Store norske leksikon: Bygdebladet.Hatlem, Bjørn Arild. 2015. Bygdebladet har fått ny redaktør. Sunnmøringen (January 14). The newspaper is published in Nynorsk and is issued on Wednesdays and Saturdays in the municipalities of Vestnes, Ørskog, Stordal, Skodje, and Haram. The paper was started in 1972 by Kjell Opsal. Opsal edited the paper until 2015, when he was succeeded by Reidar Opsal. ==Circulation== According to the Norwegian Audit Bureau of Circulations (Norsk Opplagskontroll) and the National Association of Local Newspapers (Landslaget for lokalaviser), Bygdebladet has had the following annual circulation: *2006: 3,056 *2007: 2,979 *2008: 2,847 *2009: 2,870 *2010: 2,801 *2011: 2,691 *2012: 2,642 *2013: 2,500 *2014: 2,439 *2015: 2,474 *2016: 2,474Medienorge: Opplagstall norske aviser. ==References== ==External links== *Bygdebladet home page Category:Newspapers published in Norway Category:Norwegian-language newspapers Category:Mass media in Møre og Romsdal Category:Publications established in 1972
title: Bygdebladet
